content: 1 double_crochet in each of the next 22 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 93 row 10 chain 3 1 fpdc in all sts to end turn 93 row 11 first row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 stars row 12 second row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 finished stars row 13 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st 1 single_crochet in all sts single_crochet in top of chain 2 turn 93 row 14 chain 3 1 fpdc in all sts to end turn 93 row 15 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st 1 bpsc in all sts to last chain 3 1 single_crochet in top of last chain 3 turn 93 row 16 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in all sts to end turn 93 row 17 first row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 stars row 18 second row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 finished stars row 19 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st 1 single_crochet in all sts single_crochet in top of chain 2 turn 93 row 20 as row 14 93 row 21 as row 15 93 row 22 as row 16 93 row 23 first row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 stars row 24 second row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 finished stars row 25 as row 13 93 row 26 as row 14 93 fasten_off sleeves make 2 round 1 with right side facing join yarn to side of double_crochet underarm chain 3 double_crochet in same space 1 double_crochet in each of the next 26 sts around armhole double_crochet 1 in side of double_crochet of opposite side of armhole slip_stitch to top of chain 3 turn 29 round 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet 1 fpdc in all sts to end slip_stitch to top of chain 3 turn 29 round 3 first row of star stitch when you finish the last star slip_stitch to the top of beginning chain 3 turn 14 stars k a m e crochet designs 2018 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved round 4 second row of star stitch but instead of 1 half_double_crochet into first eye make 2 half_double_crochet in all slip_stitch to top of chain 2 turn 14 finished stars round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet turn 29 round 6 chain 3 counts as double_crochet 1 fpdc in all sts to end slip_stitch to top of chain 3 turn 29 round 7 chain 1 bpsc in same st 1 bpsc in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to first bpsc turn 29 round 8 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 2 turn 29 round 9 as round 3 14 stars round 10 as round 4 14 finished stars round
